subject: Re: ENT Care | Optimisation Recommendations (For Approval)
preview: @heath Thanks for clarifying, All good now on this one.

full_threads.body: @heath Thanks for clarifying, All good now on this one.
@joel actually, we only need the one H1 tag in the header area. The other one, that was the H2, needs to be removed completely please.

@heath All good now on this one.

I'm assuming the change the h2 to h1

https://entcaresydney.com.au/new-research-in-3d-printed-implantable-ears-using-stem-cells/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@joel please see attached image.

We need to remove the H2 from the single post page, here is the link I reference in the image: https://entcaresydney.com.au/new-research-in-3d-printed-implantable-ears-using-stem-cells/

Thanks!

Hi Heath,

I hope you're doing well.

We just want to ask for your assistance on our request below:

May we ask for your assistance on this as are unable to locate where we can modify or remove the H1 below the blog images to H2.

Eugene

They are fine to go ahead

>
> Hello Dr. Payal,
>
> How are you doing? Hope you're keeping safe amidst this current situation.
>
> We have collated all the outstanding tasks awaiting for your approval, kindly view the files below:
> Blog Post Optimisation <https://t.sidekickopen06.com/s1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lM8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XWPfhMynW4WJgJ863K5bgW56dCZh7KLQvj102?te=W3R5hFj4cm2zwW3H8_MV1Jz9RGW3P3n_M3Fbt5SW4cNF573z8Qr2W3K3q0m1LwngpW2-LTN03_KDRCW47PrRD2vS1LSW3LXgJ33XZYqMW4cGnrZ2MxFLdW2310t932m5_NW4kK1YB3K2-zCW1hT8M-2dMcHhw1Z0lvy4p-2&si=8000000001492589&pi=1f759af8-c627-403c-b416-cdf042b408de> (For Approval)
> We have reviewed the existing blog posts on the website and provided optimisation recommendations which includes Heading, Title tags, Meta Descpription, URL Structure, Interlinking & Images.
> Image Optimisation <https://t.sidekickopen06.com/s1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lM8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XWPfhMynW4WJgJ863K5bgW56dCZh7KLQvj102?te=W3R5hFj4cm2zwW3H8_MV1Jz9RGW3P3n_M3Fbt5SW4cNF573z8Qr2W3K3q0m1LwngpW3_zQbC1XmQ0XW1ZrhpW3QP82sW236SyB3tVMHzW2HR0hS2Tz-j_W1_7fDk49DVTrW49k9J_3K2-zCW1hT8M-2dPjMtw22V46y4Bq2&si=8000000001492589&pi=1f759af8-c627-403c-b416-cdf042b408de> (For Approval)
> The website has images that are not properly optimised with appropriate Alt Text Tags and Image Titles. We have provided descriptive keywords suggestions on images as this will improve the relevance of the pages as well as their ranking in Google universal searches (mixed media searches such as videos, images etc).
>
> Once we have your approval, we'll proceed with the implementation. Hope to hear your feedback soon.
>
>
> Many thanks,
>
